oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Building Leadership from Within the Ranks: Leadership Fellow Initiative
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Umpstead, Regina
Hoffman, Holly
Pehrsson, Dale-Elizabeth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Creative approaches in the field of leadership often yield positive results. This article highlights an example of how out of the box thinking with regard to building a strong leadership foundation in the area of higher education benefits a community of learners. Within the field of education and human services, a new administrator facilitates innovative approaches to provide opportunities of empowerment for team members. The sustainable and abundant positive results are outlined in detail.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Education Leadership Research Center, Texas A&M University
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Advancing Women in Leadership Journal; Vol. 35 (2015); 144-152
